title: Nefertiti Hotel Luxor
adress: Al-Sahaby Lan,In Front Of Luxor Temple, East bank, 99999 Luxor
description: Overlooking the ancient Luxor Temple, Nefertiti offers comfortable rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Luxor’s railway station is only a 10-minute walk away. The rooms of Nefertiti enjoy a simple interior. Some of the rooms have a private balcony. Nefertiti has a tour desk which offers Nile River cruises and several sightseeing trips in Luxor. It also has a convenient 24-hour front desk service. A variety of drinks and Egyptian dishes are served on the rooftop terrace. Here, guests can also smoke a traditional Egyptian water pipe. It is only a 20-minute drive from Luxor International Airport. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.3 for a one-person stay.

title: Susanna Hotel Luxor
adress: 52 Karnak Temple St, East Bank, East bank, Luxor
description: Facing the Luxor Temple and the Nile, Susanna Hotel offers comfortable rooms with satellite TV and air conditioning. Facilities include an outdoor rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. All rooms of Susanna Hotel feature a balcony and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy international cuisine in Susanna Hotel’s restaurant, which offers panoramic views over Luxor city. The lobby bar serves a wide variety of drinks. It is only a 20-minute drive from Luxor International Airport, and a 10-minute walk to Luxor’s railway station. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.4 for a one-person stay.

title: Hostal Orleans
adress: Avenida Marqués de la Argentera, 13, Ciutat Vella, 08003 Barcelona, Spain
description: This pleasant guest house is located in front of Estació de França Train Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi, 50 m from Ciutadella Park. The heated rooms at Hostal Orleans have vibrant décor. Each features a plasma TV, safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Sheets and towels are also included. There is a communal lounge with sofas, computers with free internet and drinks vending machines, along with a microwave. Reception is open 24 hours and free luggage storage is provided. The Orleans guest house is 2 minutes’ walk from the Santa Maria del Mar Church and 900 m from Barceloneta Beach. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre 5 minutes’ walk away. Barceloneta Metro Station is 400 m away and La Rambla and Barcelona Cathedral can be reached by foot in 10 minutes. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.2 for a one-person stay.

title: Acta Mimic
adress: Arc del Teatre, 58, Ciutat Vella, 08001 Barcelona, Spain
description: Situated 400 m from Las Ramblas, this former theatre offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The Acta Mimic’s unique rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The Acta Mimic design hotel features black and white décor. Each open-plan room has air conditioning. The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Acta Mimic has a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available. The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 m from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 m. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.1 for a one-person stay.

title: Hotel Atlantico Tower
description: Hotel Atlantico Tower offers modern accommodations in Rio de Janeiro city centre, 600 m from Museum of Tomorrow and 1.5 km from Santos Dumont Airport. It features free WiFi, a rooftop pool with panoramic city views. Rooms at Hotel Atlantico Tower have simple interiors with tasteful wooden furnishings and light tiled floors. All are equipped with air conditioning, a minibar and a work desk for laptop use. A breakfast buffet is served daily. The Hotel is 5 km from Novo Rio bus terminal, and 12 km from Galeão International Airport. Maracanã Stadium is 3 km away, and Marquês de Sapucaí Sambadrome can be reached within a 20-minute walk. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.3 for a one-person stay.

title: DoubleTree by Hilton Toronto Downtown
description: Located in the city centre, DoubleTree by Hilton Toronto Downtown boasts an indoor heated pool, an on-site restaurant, and a fitness centre. Toronto Eaton Centre and St. Patrick Subway Station are within 350 m. Each of the tastefully decorated rooms has a flat-screen cable HDTV with pay-per-view channels. Air conditioning, safe and a coffee maker are also included. A hairdryer can be found in the bathroom. The suites offer a kitchen with a fridge/freezer, a microwave, a stovetop and utensils. Upon arrival, guests of DoubleTree by Hilton Downtown Toronto are greeted with warm chocolate chip cookies. DoubleTree by Hilton Toronto Downtown provides underground parking upon request with surcharge. Guests who pay for on-site parking can enjoy in-and-out privileges during their stay. This hotel is 1.7 km from both the popular CN Tower and Air Canada Centre. Toronto Pearson International Airport is at a distance of 30 km. This is our guests' favourite part of Toronto, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.0 for a one-person stay.

title: Park Grand London Kensington
adress: 33 - 37 Hogarth Road, Kensington and Chelsea, London, SW5 0QQ
description: Just 150 m from Earls Court Tube Station, Park Grand London Kensington is a 5-minute walk from the famous Museum Mile. It features free WiFi, stylish bedrooms and a restaurant. The elegant rooms at this 4-star hotel have luxury bathrooms with heated mirrors and free toiletries. Rooms also feature satellite TVs, tea/coffee facilities and a work desk. The property has a modern fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. It also features multi-lingual staff and air conditioning throughout. With a contemporary theme, the spacious restaurant serves a varied menu and world wine list. The bar offers beverages and light snacks, and cooked or continental breakfasts are available daily. Situated just 1.6 km from the Olympia London, Park Grand London Kensington is a 10-minute walk from glamorous Knightsbridge. The Royal Albert Hall is just a kilometer away favourite part of London, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.9 for a one-person stay.

title: Trachung Tsang Eco Lodge
description: Set in Luqu, Trachung Tsang Eco Lodge features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. This hostel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy mountain views. Gannan Xiahe Airport is 80 km away.

title: Airlie Beach Eco Cabins
description: Located in Cannonvale, 9.8 km from Airlie Beach, this property offers a unique wildlife experience in a tranquil Australian bush setting. Airlie Beach Eco Cabins features accommodation with free WiFi and is 4.2 km from Whitsunday Plaza. All cabins feature a balcony to relax on and enjoy the peaceful surroundings as well as a kitchenette with a microwave, toaster and kettle and a private bathroom with shower. Also included in all cabins is a flat-screen TV with Netflix, air-conditioning, safety deposit box and ironing facilities. During the day you can watch the cockatoos, kookaburras and Australian wildlife, or can enjoy roasting marshmallows on the outdoor fireplace in the evening. Whitsunday Coast Airport is a 30-minute drive from Airlie Beach Eco Cabins. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.5 for a one-person stay.

title: Diamond Resort Phuket - SHA
description: Diamond Resort Phuket - SHA features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden in Bang Tao Beach. Guests can enjoy Asian and International dishes at the on-site restaurant. All rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the resort. Staff at reception can provide assistance around the clock with information on the area. Catch Beach Club is a 14-minute walk from the hotel. Phuket International Airport is a 20-minute drive away, and Diamond Resort Phuket - SHA offers a free daily shuttle service to Bangtao Beach, Boat Avenue Complex. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.1 for a one-person stay. We speak your language!
